item: Press 'H' to access the help. (This screen)
Hitting other cars will score a hit. There will be a minute of play time and the ride will end.
Press 'A' or the left arrow to move left.
Press 'D' or the right arrow to move right.
Press 'W' or the up arrow to move forward.
The car will turn toward the mouse pointer.
At the end of the ride, you will earn tickets based on the number of hits.
